name: Conti Backup Database
description: Detects a command used by conti to dump database
query: (process.command_line:(/.*[Ss][Qq][Ll][Cc][Mm][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*[Ss][Qq][Ll][Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/) AND process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Ss]\ [Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Ss][Yy][Ss]\.[Ss][Yy][Ss][Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Rr]\.[Dd][Bb][Oo]\.[Ss][Yy][Ss][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa][Bb][Aa][Ss][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Uu][Pp]\ [Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa][Bb][Aa][Ss][Ee].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:(*sqlcmd\ * OR *sqlcmd.exe*) AND process.command_line:*\ \-S\ localhost\ * AND process.command_line:(*sys.sysprocesses* OR *master.dbo.sysdatabases* OR *BACKUP\ DATABASE*))`
